mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resumes (personal_id, career_id, portfolio_id, resumes_title, resumes_picture, resumes_introduce, resumes_category_id, resumes_place, created_at) VALUES(#{personalId}, #{careerId}, #{portfolioId}, #{resumesTitle}, #{resumesPicture}, #{resumesIntroduce}, #{resumesCategoryId}, #{resumesPlace}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT p.personal_name, p.personal_email, p.personal_education, p.personal_phone_number, p.personal_address, r.resumes_id, r.resumes_title, r.resumes_picture, r.resumes_introduce, r.resumes_place, r.resumes_category_id, r.career_id, r.portfolio_id, c.one_year_less, c.two_year_over, c.three_year_over, c.five_year_over, ct.category_frontend, ct.category_backend, ct.category_devops, pf.portfolio_source, pf.portfolio_file FROM resumes r INNER JOIN personal p ON r.personal_id = p.personal_id INNER JOIN career c ON r.career_id = c.career_id INNER JOIN category ct ON r.resumes_category_id = ct.category_id INNER JOIN portfolio pf ON r.portfolio_id = pf.portfolio_id where r.resumes_id = #{resumesId}
mapper.update: UPDATE resumes SET resumes_title = #{resumesTitle}, resumes_picture =#{resumesPicture}, resumes_introduce = #{resumesIntroduce}, resumes_place = #{resumesPlace} WHERE resumes_id = #{resumesId}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM resumes ORDER BY resumes_id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
SELECT resumes_id, resumes_title, resumes_place FROM resumes WHERE resumes_title like CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY resumes_id DESC OFFSET #{startNum} ROWS FETCH NEXT 5 ROWS ONLY
